Hyndland Primary Parent Council

Parent Noticeboard

Family Ceilidh, Friday 27 Nov

Come along and have some fun at the Family Ceilidh, Friday 27 Nov 2015 7pm-10pm at Partick Burgh Halls Adults £4, Children £2 Tickets limited to 3 children per adult NO unaccompanied children Tickets available on the door only

Mums on the Run – LP Run & Bake Off

Hyndland Mums on the Run is holding an LP Run and bake-off competition on Friday December 11 at 9am. For those who have never done/heard of an LP run it works like this: the run takes place at a track and those taking part need to see how many times they can get round the track in […]

Next Parent Council Meeting

The next Parent Council meeting will be on Wednesday 11 November from 7-8.30. Meetings are held in the staff room and we encourage all parents to attend to find out what is happening in the school. Go to the main door and press the buzzer for the Janny for entry.

Search for:

Donate to Parent Council

In response to requests for the ability to make donations to the Parent Council funds outwith events, we now have a PayPal account to allow parents, carers and wider families to donate towards resources for the school.

  • About

This website is for parents and carers of pupils at Hyndland Primary School and it is run by its Parent Council.

If you’d like to receive e-mail updates, please e-mail us and we can add you to the mailing list.

On the other hand, if you would like to contact the school directly, you can do so by calling them on 0141 339 7207

  • School Twitter

Website maintained by Hyndland Primary Parent Council & Ali Walker
